author: breser
msg: Fix a compiler error on IRIX (Issue #2082).
N_(x) was improperly defined as (x) which creates problems with using it in the
context of a character array initilization.  The C standard doesn't allow
parenthesis around a string constant being used to initialize a character array.
It appears that the gettext people have run into this isuse and updated their
recommendation to using #define N_(x) x.
* configure.in
* subversion/svn_private_config.hw
(N_): Remove an invalid set of parens in the macro.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add a new tool for reporting repository lock accumulation.

author: philip
msg: Followup to r11479 to fix issue 1943.  Make merge_cmd_baton.added_path
track the last dir added to a versioned dir.
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(struct merge_cmd_baton): Tweak comment.
(merge_dir_added): Simplify setting of added_dir.

author: jszakmeister
msg: Fix Issue #2091: svnadmin error on Win98: Can't convert module path to
UTF-8.
* subversion/subversion/libsvn_subr/cmdline.c
(svn_cmdline_init): if GetModuleFileNameW() fails, then fall back to the
ANSI character version and convert it to Unicode.  This prevents
ucs_path being passed uninitialized to apr_conv_ucs2_to_utf8().

author: ruben
msg: Book Spanish. Some paragraphs translated to spanish from ch03.xml
